name: Cube Race: Cops vs Robbers 3D
description:
Cube Race: Cops vs Robbers 3D is a driving simulator in the Cube City!

Be a criminal driver, steal cube cars and escape from the police with this racing simulator! Start an extreme race, steal cars, but beware of police! Car theft provokes a police chase! Avoid police chase and feel like a criminal driver! Drive fast as a criminal driver to escape from the police with Cube Race: Cops vs Robbers 3D.

Escape from the police being one of the robbers with great crime car theft game! Be a criminal driver, steal cube cars, drive fast and avoid police chase! Join the cube city race full of crime with Cube Race: Cops vs Robbers 3D! Commit a crime - Cube City is full of cars to steal! Don't let the police catch you, be a criminal driver and escape from the police with Cube Race: Cops vs Robbers 3D!

Cube Race: Cops vs Robbers 3D features:

Cube cars to steal and drive
Extreme police chase
Cube city to explore
Amazing car theft game
Be a criminal driver

Cube city is full of crime! Drive fast to escape from the police! Great car theft game for those who wants to dive into the world full of crime! Each car theft provokes a police chase! Drive from the police as a criminal driver with Cube Race: Cops vs Robbers 3D!
